author: EmptyStar
long_description:
Montserrat ESR Font
===================

Enjoy a fun and stylistic yet comfortably legible font with Montserrat ESR! This font is the "EmptyStar Remix" of the standard [Montserrat](https://github.com/JulietaUla/Montserrat) font and the Montserrat Alternates font with some extra symbols included from the [Balsamiq Sans](https://github.com/balsamiq/balsamiqsans) font, plus some minor tweaks for proper rendering in Luanti.

To use these fonts, simply install this mod and enable it for your world; Luanti version 5.11.0 or later will automatically apply these fonts to your entire in-game UI with no additional configuration required. Older versions of Luanti are unfortunately unable to apply the fonts in this mod.

And that's it! There's no code and no extra features, just a wonderfully suitable font for you to enjoy!

---

These fonts were edited using [FontForge](https://fontforge.org/). Source files are provided in `./sfd`.
name: montserrat_esr
short_description: A fresh and comfortable font remix made for Luanti
title: Montserrat ESR Font
